articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 863
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 863
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 863 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					 He went round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the unit.
					
					 He said that the unit which was organized by the strategic plan and far-sighted wisdom of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il developed into matchless combat ranks under their wise leadership and care.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the days when Kim Jong Il visited battalions under the unit, Kim Jong Un underscored the need for the unit to always remember the exploits the President and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the unit and achieve proud successes in rounding off the combat preparations and bolstering up the combat capability.
					
					 He heard a report on the combat duty to be performed by the unit and examined its operational plan.
					
					 Looking with keen attention at the documents on the operational plan of the unit, he clarified the issues arising in further completing the Juche-oriented naval tactics and skillfully applying them suited to the enemies' changing scenarios for war of aggression, methods of combat actions and features of weaponry and indicated the tasks to be fulfilled to remarkably increase the naval attack operation capabilities of the fleets of the KPA in the East and West Seas and ways to do so.
					
					 Noting that this unit has an important role to play in performing the combat duty of the combined unit, he specified to which it should pay attention in making combat preparations and on what it should focus its efforts to create battle environment favorable for the operation of the unit.
					
					 The operational combat plans on the table for operational plans at the Supreme Command are to be carried out by the commanding officers in charge of the units, he said, adding that the commanding officers and staff officers of the unit should devote all their wisdom and enthusiasm to rounding off the combat preparations so that they may fight a battle at a lightning speed once a war breaks out right now.
					
					 He instructed the unit to conduct high-intensity combat drills under the simulated conditions of a real war and thus prepare all its service personnel as stalwart fighters capable of rendering various services and performing multi-functions and Mt. Paektu tiger-like soldiers.
					
					 Stressing the need for commanding officers to take the lead in raising a hot wind of drills, he said that an officer who is not a brave fighter cannot train his soldiers as good fighters and an officer from whom one cannot feel the smell of gunpowder cannot lead his unit in the charge under a hail of bullets and shells during a decisive battle.
					
					 He underscored the need for the commanding officers and men of the unit to build a-match-for-a-hundred combat capability with utmost effort, saving every second and minute from the firm stand that there can be no satisfaction in rounding off the combat preparations.
					
					 After learning in detail about the supply service at the unit, he indicated the tasks to be fulfilled by it to further improve the living of its service personnel in conformity with its specific conditions.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' MD Moves against DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' MD Moves against DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Nationwide Emergency Measure Committee against Nuclear War Exercises against the North released a statement Saturday in connection with the disclosure of the fact that the south Korean puppet forces have tried to join in the U.S. missile defense system by introducing U.S. THAAD into south Korea.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities' MD moves are a dangerous military provocation to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and a hideous criminal act to unleash a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 Washington and Seoul are now blustering that the deployment of THAAD in south Korea is aimed to cope with a "nuclear threat" from the north.
					
					 The U.S. has posed nuclear threats to the DPRK to stifle it and this compelled the latter to have access to a nuclear deterrence for self-defence. This is a fact well known by the world.
					
					  However, they call the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence a "threat" and go desperate in their moves to build MD. This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 All facts prove that "nuclear and missile threats from the north" oft-touted by the U.S. and the puppet forces are aimed to build U.S. MD in south Korea by shipping THAAD and the like into it and thus finally round off the preparations for a nuclear war.
					
					 The deployment of THAAD will definitely turn south Korea into a nuclear outpost of the U.S., stoking military tension and the danger of a nuclear war in the region.
					
					 The puppet group should clearly understand that the deployment of THAAD will be a suicidal act of bringing a nuclear disaster to south Korea.
					
					 We will never remain an on-looker to the U.S. and the puppet forces' moves to deploy THAAD and build MD but resolutely counter them by bolstering the nuclear deterrence in every way to defend the security of the nation and the regional peace.
					
					 The statement expressed the expectation and belief that the world people, organizations and international organizations valuing justice and peace will become more assertive in their voices of denouncing the U.S. and the puppet forces' MD moves.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Personage of Peru
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Personage of Peru
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket from Tani Baler Lopera, chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp
 Samjiyon, June 14 (KCNA) -- The group of service personnel of the Korean People's Army to make the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu climbed the top of the sacred mountain of revolution at dawn of Friday.
					 The members of the group recited the poem "The eternal sun of the great Paektusan nation". It deals with grandiose appearance of thriving Korea which is shedding its rays all over the world while being proud of being blessed with illustrious leaders as it is holding the great Songun brilliant commanders in high esteem.
					
					 They sang the immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" and other songs and presented the choral recital of a poem, reflecting the revolutionary stamina to take a long journey of Songun to the last.
					
					 They arrived at Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp on Saturday.
					
					 They placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the mosaics depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the secret camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Looking round the historic relics preserved with much care in the historic house, they keenly realized once again that Kim Jong Il was the greatest man possessed of the spirit and pluck of Mt. Paektu as dispositions.
					
					 They held an oratorical meeting on the personality of the peerless great persons in front of the house.
					
					 On the same day, they went round the Sajabong secret camp and helped the work to spruce up the Paektusan secret camp as befitting revolutionary battle site.

articles.title: Talks Held between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Mozambique
articles.content:
Talks Held between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Mozambique
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, who is heading a DPRK government delegation on a visit to Mozambique and Oldemiro Baloi, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique, at the building of the ministry on June 11.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Mozambique and from the opposite side the director for Asia and Oceania of the ministry, the Mozambican ambassador to the DPRK and officials concerned.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of developing the bilateral friendly relations and other issues of mutual concerns.
					
					 Oldemiro Baloi said that former President Samora Moises Machel visited the DPRK several times and was honored with the audience of President Kim Il Sung, receiving his precious teachings.
					
					 The bilateral relationship provided by the preceding leaders is the solid friendly and cooperative relations with a long historical tradition, he noted.
					
					 Referring to Kim Il Sung Street in Maputo City, he highly praised the greatness of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Mozambican government and people will make positive efforts to comprehensively boost the economic cooperation with the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 He expressed full support for the DPRK government and people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 After the talks a protocol on political and diplomatic negotiations was signed between the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mozambique.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Performs in Huichon
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Performs in Huichon
 Huichon, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Stated Merited Chorus gave a performance in Huichon, Jagang Province on Friday.
					 Among the audience were officials and workers in the field of machine-building industry in Huichon City.
					
					 The performance began with male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army." Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as orchestra and serial songs "Song in Praise of the Sun" and male choruses "Thanks to the Fatherly General", "Nobody Matches the Marshal" and "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the foresightedness and undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who laid an eternal foundation for the self-supporting national economy by taking the untrodden path of history and provided the inexhaustible potentials of Juche-based industry by dint of Songun.
					
					 Also staged were mixed duet and male chorus "Jagang Province Is the One My Country Boasts of", male solo and chorus "My Blessed Life" and male chorus "Our Future Is Bright" to rev up the mood of the performance.
					
					 Male solo and male chorus "We Started from Scratch" was put on the stage again at the ardent request of the audience.
					
					 The performance goes on in Huichon.

articles.title: Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification Visited by Over One Million for 13 Years
articles.content:
Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification Visited by Over One Million for 13 Years
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, working people of all social strata, school youth and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners visit the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification. 
					 The monument was erected on August 14, Juche 90 (2001). Since then more than one million people of over 8 000 organizations visited it.
					
					 The monument reflects the strong desire and will of all the Koreans to reunify the country at any cost guided by the three charters for national reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It portrays two women attired in Korean dress running toward each other with their arms open while shouting hurrah for reunification.
					
					 There are groups of subsidiary theme sculptures divided into parts of the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the hurrah for reunified Korea at the platforms of the tower.
					
					 The monument to the President's proposition on reunification was erected in the plaza of the monument.
					
					 Heads of state and political and social figures of over 50 countries and regions, a lot of organizations and figures of south Korea and abroad donated nearly 830 stones to the tower.
					
					"Long live General Kim Jong Il, the lodestar of national reunification!" and "We will carry out the June 15 and October 4 declarations to achieve the independent reunification by Our Nation Itself!" and other letters carved on the stones reflect the strong aspiration and desire of Koreans to achieve the reunification of the country without fail under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: News Analysis on June 15 Era of Reunification in Korea
articles.content:
News Analysis on June 15 Era of Reunification in Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- It has been 14 years after the North-South Joint Declaration, a banner for independent reunification of the Korean nation, was adopted on June 15, Juche 89 (2000).
					 The adoption warmed up the relations between the north and the south of Korea, locked in confrontation and distrust, bringing about remarkable events to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 With this declaration, the north-south relationship turned into that of reconciliation, cooperation and unity. Until 2007, there took place at least 140 dialogues and contacts between the authorities of the two sides, including 21 ministerial talks and 13 meetings of the north-south committee for the promotion of economic cooperation.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself, a core of the joint declaration, gave an impetus to the nationwide movement for independent reunification.
					
					 Personages and organizations of different strata from the north and the south had a grand seminar on national reunification at Mt. Kumgang Resort in 2001 to mark the 1st anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, for the first time in the history of national division.
					
					 And compatriots from the north and the south of Korea and abroad met in Pyongyang on August 15, the day of the national liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, that year to hold a grand festival of national reunification.
					
					 On August 15, 2002, personages of different strata in the north went to Seoul to have a grand rally for national reunification with their fellow countrymen in the south, displaying the Korean nation's ardent zeal for reunification.
					
					 There also took place such various events as gatherings, rallies and seminars of compatriots from all walks of life in the north and the south to support and implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 At those pro-reunification events, all the participants hailed the joint declaration and expressed their strong will to bring earlier the reunification of the country by the united efforts of the nation without any intervention of the foreign forces. 
					
					 In the meantime, railroads, which had been severed for more than half a century, were reconnected on the east and west coastal areas of the country thanks to the joint efforts of the north and the south. 
					
					Economic cooperation gained in scope and exchanges developed in sports, culture and other fields between the two sides.
					
					 In October 2007 another historic inter-Korean summit took place in Pyongyang, which resulted in the adoption of the October 4 Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity. This significant event again showed the Koreans' fixed will for national reunification. 
					
					 Any frantic efforts of the separatists at home and abroad can never break the Korean nation's will to accelerate the reunification movement under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Way for Improved Inter-Korean Relations Lies in Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration: News Analyst
articles.content:
Way for Improved Inter-Korean Relations Lies in Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation is now wishing the improved north-south relations through implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The joint declaration, adopted at the north-south summit in Pyongyang on June 15, Juche 89 (2000), is a grand reunification program common to the Korean nation and a landmark for its independent reunification. Expounded in it are the orientation and ways for achieving the national reconciliation and unity and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The DPRK has so far made positive and sincere efforts for its implementation, but there are still lots of obstacles and difficulties in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 Despite its well-intentioned steps, the separatist forces in south Korea have hindered the implementation of the joint declaration.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, former chief executive of south Korea, and his group of traitors had persistently refused to implement the declaration during his tenure of office, asserting that the new "government" is under no obligation to abide by what the preceding one agreed to do.
					
					 Putting up such anti-DPRK policy as the watchword of "denuclearization, opening and 3 000 dollars", they viciously slandered the north-south joint declarations and attempted, in league with alien forces, to inflict a nuclear holocaust on the nation. After all, any contact and dialogue, exchange and cooperation between both sides were completely intercepted.
					
					 The present Park Geun Hye "government" in south Korea, too, follows in the track of the preceding "government".
					
					 During her "presidential election campaign", Park advertised that she would "recognize" the north-south joint declarations. But as soon as she took the power, she revealed her true colors as a confrontation maniac, saying that she would resolutely counter the north's "provocation" with south Korea-U.S. cooperation. In actuality, the Park group has got hell-bent on the confrontation with the DPRK, staging with the U.S. in south Korea Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Ulji Freedom Guardian and other war games for aggression on it.
					
					 Park and her group attempted to systemically and totally destroy the achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification and baffled the talks between authorities of the north and the south, arranged with much efforts. They went the lengths of opening to the public the minutes of the north-south summit and removed articles related to the October 4 declaration from the "second principal plan for the development of south-north relations".
					
					 Now they drive the north-south relations to the worst confrontation and war crisis through such persistent anti-DPRK moves as continued war exercises with foreign forces, scattering of propaganda leaflets, slandering by conservative media and cruel piracy.
					
					 All the facts go to prove that it is impossible to expect the smooth implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the nation's reconciliation and unity as long as the separatist forces disliking detente of the Korean peninsula and improved north-south relations are not removed from the nation.
					
					 All Koreans should unite close in the idea of By Our Nation Itself to smash every move of the separatist forces. This is the only way for preserving the June 15 era of reunification and achieving the independent reunification and peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Papers Call for Respecting and Implementing North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Papers Call for Respecting and Implementing North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The north-south summit was held and the June 15 joint declaration was adopted in June, Juche 89 (2000) for the first time in the history of the national division, events to be specially recorded in the history of the movement for national reunification, says papers Saturday in articles.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes that to preserve and implement the north-south joint declaration is the only way for the Korean nation to live. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration serves as a declaration of independent reunification and a declaration of the great national unity which solemnly demonstrates at home and abroad the will to independently settle the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The eye-opening reality in the north-south relations and the movement for national reunification after the publication of the north-south joint declaration proved that the idea of By Our Nation Itself serves as an engine for instilling the will for reconciliation and unity into all Koreans and putting the movement for national reunification on the orbit of independence.
					
					 The north-south relations which favorably developed together with the June 15 era of reunification was pushed to a total collapse after the Lee Myung Bak group took office in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces are talking about "unification" with watchwords "confidence-building process", "the doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" and "the Dresden declaration". This is an open denial of the north-south declarations, pursuant to their ambition to do harm to the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that if Koreans preserve and implement the north-south joint declaration, the road to reunification and prosperity will be paved and if not, it will bring nothing but confrontation and war.
					
					 It is no doubt that when all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad vigorously struggle, holding invariably and high the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the banner of independent reunification, the movement for national reunification will advance dynamically and great progress in the June 15 era of reunification be made.
					
					 Minju Joson says that no matter how desperately the group of anti-reunification traitors is working, they can never quell the aspiration of fellow countrymen to achieve the national reconciliation and unity and independent reunification by implementing the joint declaration.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Candidate for S. Korean Prime Minister for His Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Candidate for S. Korean Prime Minister for His Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Torrents of reckless remarks let loose by  Mun Chang Guk, candidate for the puppet prime minister of south Korea, are stunning its political and social circles every day.
					 Mun in his lecture given at a church in 2011 talked nonsense that the military rule of the Japanese imperialists over Korea and the Korean division caused by the U.S. after its liberation were an expression of the "will of the God."
					
					 These were outpourings that stunned all people and country-selling remarks made by a pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. lackey.
					
					 The history of the Korean nation records pro-Japanese elements who shamefully sold off its soul to the Japanese imperialists and sycophants towards the U.S. who blindly kowtowed to it.
					
					 However, the history knows no such a foolish traitor to the nation as Mun who described the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists over Korea and its division caused by the U.S. as an expression of the "will of the God" and as the fate the Korean nation had to meet.
					
					 His remarks are an unbearable insult to the Korean nation which has suffered all sorts of misfortunes and pain for centuries due to outsiders.
					
					 What Mun uttered is nothing but politically-motivated hysteria of a guy who knows no fear of divine punishment.
					
					 By origin, he had hysterical way of thinking. Since he got a job in the south Korean paper Choongang Ilbo in 1975, he has run the whole gamut of odd remarks in a bid to lay his base in the political and media circles.
					
					 Mun was strongly censured by the south Korean people for his reckless remarks that the Korean nation was "lazy and it lacked independence."
					
					 He also let loose such sophism that Japan "transferred technology" to Korea during its colonial rule over the latter and that "Korea was fortunate to have Japan as a neighbor." 
					
					 Being such human scum, Mun tried hard to "justify" before religionists the Japanese imperialist's colonial rule over Korea and its division, talking about "the will of the God."
					
					 His remarks were so ridiculous that the floor leader of the Democratic Alliance for New Politics on June 12 deplored that he could hardly understand whether Mun is a candidate for the prime minister or an official of the government-general in Korea during the rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 That is why not only progressive forces of various strata including patriotic religionists in south Korea but even newly elected lawmakers from the "Saenuri party" are demanding Mun give up his candidacy of his own accord as he lacked a clear outlook on history acceptable to the public.
					
					 The Koreans will never pardon the above-said acts to justify the tragedy of national sufferings and division.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Assail Park Geun Hye for Turning away from Public Demand
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Assail Park Geun Hye for Turning away from Public Demand
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Media of south Korea accused Park Geun Hye of informally designating an ultra-rightist conservative media man as "prime minister."
					 The south Korean paper Hangyore in an editorial on June 10 recalled that Park nominated Mun Chang Guk, former chief editor of the south Korean paper Choongang Ilbo, as "prime minister."
					
					 Mun has been censured as an ultra-rightist media man, the editorial noted, adding:
					
					 He once revealed his conservative nature by taking the lead in finding fault with welfare policies.
					
					 Right after Park took office, Mun competed for the post of the director general of the Foundation for Promotion of Media under the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tour but was forced to drop out. This means that the present "government" is about to appoint the man, whom it once estimated as not to be qualified to be the chief of an local self-governing body, to the post of supervising the state administration.
					
					 Park should know that even the ruling camp estimates the results of the recent elections as a yellow card to her unilateral state administration.
					
					 The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial titled "Dark shadow to be cast by nomination of ultra-rightist prime minister" on June 11.
					
					 The editorial recalled that Mun groundlessly accused and slandered through media Kim Dae Jung and Roh Moo Hyun in the past while praising Syngman Rhee, Park Chung-hee and other erstwhile dictators.
					
					 After the elections to local self-governing bodies, Park trumpeted about what she called reshuffle.
					
					 One can easily imagine what kind of reshuffle it is in the measures taken by her for personnel affairs.
					
					 The nomination of Mun is casting a dark shadow on the future of the south Korean society.
					
					 It is because the reshuffle planned by Park is nothing but a signal that she would bring the era of ultra-rightist dictatorship back to south Korea.
					
					 The editorial branded the Park regime as the "one that does not seek understanding" as it turns its face away from the public demand.

articles.title: Severe Punishment of Criminals Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Severe Punishment of Criminals Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on Tuesday in a commentary demanded the prosecution severely punish the criminals who opened the minutes of the north-south summit to public.
					 The commentary recalled that the prosecution announced the results of its investigation into the case of opening to public the minutes of the south-north summit.
					
					 The results laid bare the fact that the prosecution directed all efforts to declaring such arch criminals as Kim Mu Song and Jong Mun Hon, lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party," not guilty, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 We bitterly condemn the prosecution for clearing of the charges of those who illegally opened to public the confidential document and abused the south-north relations for their political purposes.
					
					 The prosecution did not investigate at all Kim Mu Song's crime which was impossible to commit without seeing the original of the minutes and imposed a light penalty on Jong Mun Hon.
					
					 On the contrary, the lawmaker from the opposition party who disclosed the Intelligence Service's involvement in the election rigging was prosecuted for detaining a woman agent of the Intelligence Service.
					
					 The investigation results offer a good example proving why the prosecution is called political prosecution. The criminals deserve a severe punishment.

articles.title: Actions for Peace, Independence and People's Living Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Peace, Independence and People's Living Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting to commemorate the 27th anniversary of the June Popular Resistance took place in Seoul on June 10 under the sponsorship of the Society for Inheriting the June Democratic Resistance, the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea.
					 Present there were members of civic and social organizations, lawmakers from opposition parties and other people from all walks of life.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said 27 years have passed since the June resistance but the situation remains as urgent as in 1987.
					
					 The draconian dictatorial regime, which sought to cover up the death of Ri Han Ryol who was mercilessly killed for taking part in the June resistance, is quite same as the present ruling forces working hard to conceal the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, they held.
					
					 Corrupt and incompetent Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" keen on actions against democracy and the people and acts of treachery are putting up the slogan for eliminating some forces, but they are the very ones to be eliminated, they added.
					
					 They urged the authorities to transform Chongwadae, the "Saenuri Party", pro-Japanese elements and remnants of the "yusin" clique before talking about reshuffle.
					
					 The spirit of the June resistance will be overridden unless the truth about the past illegal "presidential" election and the ferry Sewol disaster is probed and those responsible are punished, they stressed.
					
					 They called for turning out once again in actions for peace of this land, social independence and people's vital rights.

articles.title: Punishment of Those Accountable for Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Those Accountable for Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster in south Korea in a trial demanded a thorough probe into the truth behind the accident and severe punishment of those responsible for it.
					 There took place the first trial of the captain and 15 crewmen of the ferry Sewol at the Kwangju District Court on June 10.
					
					 The captain and the crewmen were put in custody and indicted on the charges of murder, etc. as they took to flight to survive, instead of taking measures for rescuing passengers when the accident occurred on April 16.
					
					 However, they denied the suspicion about murder, shamelessly claiming they had no responsibility for the death of passengers.
					
					 At the trial bereaved families declared had the ferry made even a single proper broadcasting calling for escape and had the captain and the crewman guided the passengers the moment they were going to escape from it, children would have been saved.
					
					 They angrily questioned the captain and the crewmen if their acts of taking to flight to survive, leaving the passengers behind, are not a murder, then what is it?
					
					 The court that day shook with shouts of curse and resentment at the corrupt south Korean society which took so many lives as it regards money dearer than human lives.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Karachi on June 7.
					 Amar Jit Malhotra, senator from the Pakistan Awami National Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Italy
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An Italian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Rome on June 10.
					 Franco Costanzi, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including seminar, remembrance meeting and film show to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Belarus
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Belarus on June 3.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits and hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Personages of Indonesia, Myanmar
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Personages of Indonesia, Myanmar
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Personages of Indonesia and Myanmar released statements on June 4 and 9 on the occasions of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said that all the miraculous successes achieved in the DPRK would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 We highly praise the great exploits performed by HE Kim Jong Il for the development of the party, the state and the army.
					
					 We, fully supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, are convinced that Korea would be reunified independently and peacefully in the spirit of the declaration.
					
					 The director-general of a publishing house of Myanmar noted:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il who regarded national reunification as his lifelong mission formulated the proposals for reunification set forth by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification and aroused all the Korean people to the drive to implementing them.
					
					 He said that the north-south summits were provided in 2000 and 2007 and the bright future of Korea's reunification was opened by the adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration thanks to the ardent patriotism and broad magnanimity of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lao Newspapers Highly Praise Kim Jong Il as Master of Independent Politics
articles.content:
Lao Newspapers Highly Praise Kim Jong Il as Master of Independent Politics
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Lao newspapers carried special write-ups on June 9 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Pasason carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, master of independent politics" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, was the greatest master of independent politics the world political history had ever known.
					
					 His most important exploit was that he established the Songun political mode.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to realize the human cause of independence and conducted energetic external activities to strengthen the world anti-imperialist and independent forces.
					
					 The vitality of his independent politics was fully displayed when the north and the south of Korea brought about the June 15 era of reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Congtap Pasason Lao and Heng Ngan also carried articles praising the immortal exploits he performed before the era and history under the uplifted banner of independence and Songun. They also carried portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Praise Kim Jong Il as Peerless Elder Statesman
articles.content:
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Round-table talks, seminars and book and photo exhibitions were held in Brazil, Bangladesh and Indonesia between June 7 and 9.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were works of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing the true appearance of the DPRK.
					
					 The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil said that Kim Jong Il made all his efforts for the development of the WPK and happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy highly praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless elder statesman who led the WPK to victory with his distinguished political ability.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia noted that Kim Jong Il brought about a great change in all fields including the party work and army building. The army and the people of the DPRK will surely build a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the director added.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Sweden
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Sweden
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting for solidarity with the Korean people in Sweden on June 7 to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said remarkable successes unimaginable in the past were made in the movement for Korea's reunification since the publication of the declaration, adding:
					
					 Dark clouds of a war and confrontation are hanging in the sky above the Korean peninsula owing to the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The eye-opening reality on the Korean peninsula after the adoption of the declaration clearly showed that the Korean nation can put an end to the shameful history of division and domination and interference of outsiders and build a reunified power if it gets united under the banner of independence. 
					
					 A message of solidarity to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Refers to Significance of Victory in Pochonbo Battle
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Refers to Significance of Victory in Pochonbo Battle
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Torch kindled in Pochonbo" was posted on a website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on June 5 on the occasion of the 77th anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 Noting the victory in the battle was a great event as it humbled the pride of the Japanese imperialists who styled themselves an "emperor" of Asia, the article said:
					
					 The torch kindled in Pochonbo served as a beacon of national rebirth as it instilled into the Korean people optimism and conviction that Korea was not dead but alive and they could liberate the country if they fought.
					
					 The Korean people held General Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the leader of the nation and savior of national rebirth, firmly convinced that he would surely bring about the day of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The torch kindled in Pochonbo strikingly demonstrated the steadfast will of the Korean revolutionaries to pioneer and advance the revolution with arms.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in pamphlet by the Yvsh-Ata Publishing House of Kyrgyzstan on June 3.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the fundamental requirement for successfully advancing the Korean revolution to invariably hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 863 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 863 de EPC
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 863 del EPC galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					El dijo que la unidad, organizada por el proposito estrategico y la perspicacia extraordinaria  del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se ha intensificado como invictas filas combativas bajo la sabia orientacion y atencion de esos grandes hombres.
					
					Recordando con emocion los dias en que el Dirigente visito los batallones adscritos a la unidad, el Mariscal senalo que todos los uniformados de la unidad deben lograr los exitos enorgullecedores en la perfeccion de preparativos de combate y la intensificacion de la combatividad sin olvidarse siempre de las hazanas de orientacion militar del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Escucho el informe sobre la mision combativa de la unidad y examino el plan operacional.
					
					Revisando atentamente los planes operacionales de la unidad, el Mariscal aclaro los asuntos que se presentan en completar mas y aplicar adiestradamente las autoctonas tacticas maritimas para hacer frente al variable intento de guerra de agresion de los enemigos, las maneras de accion combativa y la caracteristica de armas, e indico las tareas y los remedios para intensificar notablemente la capacidad de operacion de ofensiva maritima de las flotas oriental y occidental de nuestras fuerzas. 
					
					La unidad desempena un rol importante en el cumplimiento de misiones combativas de la unidad combinada, asevero e instruyo detalladamente en que se debe concentrar las fuerzas para perfeccionar los preparativos de batalla y crear un favorable ambiente combativo para las operaciones.
					
					Acoto que los planes de operaciones y combates de la Comandancia Suprema se llevan a la realidad por los comandantes de la unidad. Y exhorto a ellos y los funcionarios del estado mayor a dedicar toda su inteligencia y pasion a la perfeccion de preparativos de combate con la meta de acabar la batalla como un relampago si se desata la guerra ahora mismo.
					
					Ordeno realizar intensamente en un ambiente de batalla real todos los entrenamientos combativos de la unidad, de modo que todos los combatientes se formaran como verdaderos y multifuncionales uniformados especializados en todas las armas y como tigres del monte Paektu.
					
					Subrayo que los oficiales deben tomar la delantera en levantar el fervor de entrenamiento y anadio que los oficiales ignorantes de batalla no podran formar a los militares capaces y que los oficiales carentes de olor a polvora no podran dirigir su unidad en los dias de batalla.
					
					Reitero que los oficiales y combatientes de la unidad, conservando la invariable posicion de que no habra el satisfecho en la perfeccion de preparativos de combate, deben consolidar por todos los medios la combatividad de uno contra cien enemigos al escatimar los minutos y segundos.
					
					Averiguo detalladamente el estado de labor de intendencia de la unidad y presento las tareas que se presentan en mejorar mas la vida de los militares conforme a la caracteristica de la unidad.
					
					Le acompano el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: CPME rechaza establecimiento de sistema antimisiles en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CPME rechaza establecimiento de sistema antimisiles en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se ha revelado el intento de los titeres surcoreanos de introducir el misil interceptor estadounidense THAAD en el suelo surcoreano e incorporarse al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU., el Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte hizo publica el dia 14 la siguiente declaracion:
					El hecho recien revelado deviene una aventurera provocacion militar y crimen para asestar el golpe nuclear preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y desatar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos dicen que el emplazamiento de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano es para hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea (RPDC).
					
					Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que EE.UU. vino ejerciendo la amenaza nuclear sobre la RPDC para atropellarla. Por eso, la segunda se vio obligada a disponer del disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos se enfrascan en el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles cuestionando como "amenaza" el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC. 
					
					Los hechos revelados esta vez evidencian que uno de los importantes objetivos de la insistencia de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea en la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea" es establecer el sistema antimisiles norteamericano mediante la introduccion de las armas como THAAD y completar los preparativos de guerra nuclear. 
					
					De ser desplegado el THAAD, el suelo surcoreano se convertira mas en la base avanzada nuclear de EE.UU. y llegaran al extremo la tension militar y el peligro de guerra nuclear en la region. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que la ubicacion del THAAD les conducira a la autodestruccion. 
					
					No estaremos con brazos cruzados ante el emplazamiento de THAAD y el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles en el suelo surcoreano sino responderemos rotundamente con el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para defender la seguridad de la nacion y la paz de la region.
					
					Por ultimo, la nota expresa la esperanza y la conviccion de que los pueblos y entidades de varios paises del mundo amantes de la justicia y la paz y las organizaciones internacionales alzaran mas las voces de denuncia contra el intento de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos de establecer el sistema de defensa antimisil.
